newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Advanced Energy raised.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Advanced Energy raised.

text.p: -- UBS Securities said it upgraded Advanced Energy Industries Inc to buy from hold.
-- set a 12-month price target of $12 a share.
-- said Advanced Energy has one of the best franchises in the capital equipment sector.
-- said seminconductor segment of the business remains weak, but other business segments are strong.
-- Advanced Energy gained 1/4 to 7-3/8 in early morning trading.
